messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Error Error power systems diverted massive powerspike detected station-wide EMP unavoidable Error Error

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone get a station bounced radio, there is a delta level quarantine on us. which can't be good, Get a station bounced radio and ARM yourselves

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Isaac Riker. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Mayday Mayday we are on a collision course with your station we can not stop O-

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have recived the distress signal from the torrens before it colided with your station keep the survivors safe on your end we will send a small pickup crew to get them later we hope everything will be fine on your station and all

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: To all crew, I found a supply, it's the captains office, everyone go their by maint

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Where we're going, we won't need eyes to see.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The threat of this is too much, everyone get too sec.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have detected forign bio signatures upon your station and a lack of actual human life so we are sending a small armed tea. to asses and assist in your situation

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Just kill yourself, it can't burst if you die

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone go to bridge, the queen bitch is there.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There are two others. go out to kill
